entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rouyn-Noranda
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -28.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rouyn Airport 06:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -28.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -31.9°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:56 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:56 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
